statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Doe' AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1 AND email = 'john.doe@example.com';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE state = 'NY' AND zip_code = '10001';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE age > 50 AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date < '2022-01-01' AND price > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 2 AND total_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM Order WHERE customer_id = 2 AND total_amount > 1000;
DELETE FROM products WHERE price > 100 AND category = 'Electronics';
